snippet.title: PO'ed: Definitive Edition - Announcement Trailer | Nightdive Studios
snippet.description:
{{{ begin transmission }}}

The 90s called, they want their graphics back. They also said something about needing help fighting aliens, so we found a way to kill two bugs with one frying pan, so to speak.

Grab yourself your very own frying pan and butcher’s knife and get ready for something tasty, because we’re serving up delicious 90s graphics and alien giblets on a gourmet platter with… PO'ed: Definitive Edition!

It’s exactly like the PO’ed you remember from back in the day but like, enhanced. No seriously, it’s enhanced, we promise.

~ Love, Nightdive ~

{{{ end transmission }}}

PO'ed: Definitive Edition is coming soon to PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC. Stay tuned for a release date!

🚨 WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM 🚨

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2697470/POed_Definitive_Edition/

GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/poed_definitive_edition

 #nightdive #KEX #announcement 



-------------------------------------------------------------------
http://www.nightdivestudios.com
https://www.facebook.com/NightdiveStudios
https://twitter.com/nightdivestudio
